price: Em absoluto, isso não é certo! Quando a terra for pulverizada, pulvérea, pulvereamente,
arabic: كَلَّآۖ إِذَا دُكَّتِ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ دَكّٗا دَكّٗا

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: kallā idhā dukkati al-arḍu dakkan dakkan
